titles.title: Job Creation Act of 2001
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to eliminate the tax on the net capital gain of taxpayers other than corporations.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 5/26/2001--Introduced. Job Creation Act of 2001 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to exclude net capital gain from the gross income of taxpayers other than corporations.
